SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface ICampValidationService

All Known Implementing Classes:
CampValidationService
public interface ICampValidationService
The ICampValidationService interface defines methods for validating criterions for camp-related operations.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    dateClashExists(Camp camp1, Camp camp2)
    Checks if a date clash exists between two camps.
    boolean
    hasDateClash(Student student, Camp newCamp)
    Checks if adding the specified camp for the given student causes a date clash.

    Checks if the camp committee for the specified camp is full.

    Checks if the specified camp is full.

    Checks if the specified camp is over based on the current date.
    boolean

    Checks if the specified camp is registered.
    boolean

    Checks if the specified student is part of any camp committee.

    Checks if the specified camp name is valid, i.e., not already used by existing camps.

  • Method Details

    • hasDateClash

      boolean hasDateClash(Student student, Camp newCamp)
      Checks if adding the specified camp for the given student causes a date clash.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student for whom to check the date clash
      newCamp - the Camp to check for date clash
      Returns:
      true if a date clash exists, false otherwise

    • dateClashExists

      boolean dateClashExists(Camp camp1, Camp camp2)
      Checks if a date clash exists between two camps.
      Parameters:
      camp1 - the first Camp to compare
      camp2 - the second Camp to compare
      Returns:
      true if a date clash exists, false otherwise

    • isCampOver

      boolean isCampOver(Date currentDate, Camp camp)
      Checks if the specified camp is over based on the current date.
      Parameters:
      currentDate - the current date
      camp - the Camp to check
      Returns:
      true if the camp is over, false otherwise

    • isCampFull

      boolean isCampFull(Camp camp)
      Checks if the specified camp is full.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp to check
      Returns:
      true if the camp is full, false otherwise

    • isCampCommitteeFull

      boolean isCampCommitteeFull(Camp camp)
      Checks if the camp committee for the specified camp is full.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp to check
      Returns:
      true if the camp committee is full, false otherwise

    • isUserCampCommitteeForCamp

      boolean isUserCampCommitteeForCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Checks if the specified student is part of the camp committee for the given camp.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to check
      camp - the Camp for which to check the committee membership
      Returns:
      true if the student is a committee member, false otherwise

    • isUserCampCommittee

      boolean isUserCampCommittee(Student student)
      Checks if the specified student is part of any camp committee.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to check
      Returns:
      true if the student is a committee member, false otherwise

    • isUserWithdrawnFromCamp

      boolean isUserWithdrawnFromCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Checks if the specified student has withdrawn from the given camp.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to check
      camp - the Camp for which to check withdrawal
      Returns:
      true if the student has withdrawn, false otherwise

    • isUserRegisteredWithCamp

      boolean isUserRegisteredWithCamp(Student student, Camp camp)
      Checks if the specified student is registered for the given camp.
      Parameters:
      student - the Student to check
      camp - the Camp for which to check registration
      Returns:
      true if the student is registered, false otherwise

    • isCampRegistered

      boolean isCampRegistered(Camp camp)
      Checks if the specified camp is registered.
      Parameters:
      camp - the Camp to check
      Returns:
      true if the camp is registered, false otherwise

    • isValidName

      boolean isValidName(List<Camp> existingCamps, String newCampName)
      Checks if the specified camp name is valid, i.e., not already used by existing camps.
      Parameters:
      existingCamps - a List of existing Camp objects
      newCampName - the new camp name to validate
      Returns:
      true if the name is valid, false otherwise
